name: Ghost Loop
description:
The ghost Gerda is lonely and wants to spend Yuletide with some friends. The only problem is that she’s the only dead person. Scare people to death to make them join you in celebrating the yuletide festivities!

A whimsical endless puzzler.

How to play:

Gather the whole town before the night of Yule in 5 days!

Tap left side of the screen to toggle sheet on and off.  Tap right side of the screen to "jump".

When your sheet is off you are invisible to the good people of Rigorton and so you can't scare the life out of them. On the other hand you can collect the packaged gifts Father Yule has scattered through out the town. 

When your sheet is on you can gather the spirits of all characters. Beware, crashing into things leaves it behind. Certain animals will pull it of too, and it will be gone forever.

Tip: Many fabrics can be utelised as a ghost sheet!

Beta:
